amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before any short title), insert the following new section: SEC.__. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to provide payments (or to pay the salaries and expenses of personnel to provide payments) to the Brazil Cotton Institute.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act to be used to provide payments to the Brazil Cotton Institute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kind amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 197 (Roll no. 439).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kind amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 197 (Roll no. 439).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Kind.
